summary: Feature request to make the `create` command's post-installation instructions more intelligent by detecting the platform and checking if dependencies like docker-compose, Temporal Server, and Node.js are already installed before displaying setup instructions.
userImpact: Users would see only relevant setup instructions for their specific platform and environment, reducing unnecessary output and confusion.
proposedFix: Support templating in .post-create file (handlebars/ejs) or replace with .post-create.js script for conditional logic.
resolutionDetails: Team decided the package initializer was already complex enough and that the custom template approach was sufficient for maintainability.
keyQuote: I think our package initializer is complex enough as is. The custom template is more than enough imho.
